thread.title: 5 times Bollywood hotties reminded us of Valentine’s Day

title: 5 times Bollywood hotties reminded us of Valentine’s Day
text:
5 times Bollywood hotties reminded us of Valentine’s Day Feburary 08, 2017 1 /6 Valentine's Day outfit ideas! 
Whether you’re going out with your boyfriend or a bunch of girls, dressing up on Valentine’s Day can always be fun. Single or not, try these outfit ideas from our favourite Bollywood divas and make an impression on the V-Day! All Comments () Be the first one to review. We have sent you a verification email. To verify, just follow the link in the message 2 /6 Parineeti Chopra 
What’s a better day to channel your inner Disney princess' dreams than Valentine’s Day? Take a cue from Parineeti to work a big bow pink gown for a princess-esque avatar. All Comments () Be the first one to review. We have sent you a verification email. To verify, just follow the link in the message 3 /6 Neha Dhupia 
If you can’t wear heels on a date night, no worries! Take a cue from Neha Dhupia to work the white sneakers from Gucci with cutesy hearts and work the trend. (Image: Instagram/afashionistasdiaries) All Comments () Be the first one to review. We have sent you a verification email. To verify, just follow the link in the message 4 /6 Deepika Padukone 
All you need is love and Deepika says it out loud! She was seen carrying a ‘love’ bag a while ago and now spotted wearing a ‘love’ bomber jacket, both from Givenchy. Just like her, wear the jacket on your LBD or even a basic tee and be love ready! (Image: Viral Bhayani , Instagram) All Comments ()
